entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
